finance.title: Earth is our lovely planet where we live .
finance.author: sushil modi
finance.description: Earth is the third planet from the Sun and the only known celestial body to support life. It has a diverse range of ecosystems, including oceans, forests, deserts, and more. Earth is also known as the 'Blue Planet' due to its abundant water. It takes approximately 365.25 days to orbit the Sun, giving rise to our concept of a year.
